summary: Simple mod that changes the Deadly Aim perk from 3 times damage to 5
descriptionHtml:
I felt the sneak attack damage for bows was too low after taking Deadly Aim so I changed it from 3x to 5x

I have only found one similar mod here and it didn\'t seem to work so I learned to do it myself. This is such a simple tweak that you can do with it what you will, let me know if you are having issues with it.
author: TheNamelessWatcher
